tool_description: Provide regions, cities and districts per countries
title: Gis Engine

api_list.name: Get districts
api_list.description:
Get districts by providing the country code, region code and city number

- country_code can be fetch from Get Countries endpoint
- region_code can be fetch from Get Regions endpoint
- city_num can be fetch from the Get Cities endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gis-engine.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{country_code}/regions/{region_code}/cities/{city_num}/districts"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gis-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get cities
api_list.description:
Get cities by providing the country code and region code

- country_code can be fetch from Get Countries endpoint
- region_code can be fetch from Get Regions endpoint
api_list.code:

    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gis-engine.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get regions

api_list.name: Get country details

api_list.name: Health Check
api_list.description: Provide a way to test connectivity to API
